thread.title: Rob Gronkowski Caught Humping a Middle-Aged Woman at an Awards Show
thread.title_full: Rob Gronkowski Caught Humping a Middle-Aged Woman at an Awards Show | Complex UK

author: Chris Yuscavage
title: Rob Gronkowski Caught Humping a Middle-Aged Woman at an Awards Show
text:
On Tuesday night, the Boston Globe held their first-ever The Globies awards show in Boston to honor New England’s best athletes and, of course, Rob Gronkowski was in attendance. We know this because he won awards for Best Quote: and Best Social Media Campaign by a Brand (for this and this ). But we also know it because he spent a few seconds humping a middle-aged woman at the show. The moment was captured by a Twitter user who was there and promptly uploaded to YouTube for all to see:
I was within 2 feet of @RobGronkowski last night and then this happened and I dont think ill ever get over it https://t.co/sWfnMQFmQF
— Cbordas (@bordasc) October 7, 2015 WTF? At least he didn't go this route again.
Send all complaints, compliments, and tips to sportstips@complex.com .
[ via Barstool Sports ]
